argument.description: An expression that specifies the percentile.
Specifies the order of the rows from the same grouping set that are processed in the aggregation.
An expression that specifies the percentile.
An expression that specifies the percentile.

description: The PERCENTILE_CONT function returns the value that corresponds to the specified percentile given a sort specification by using a continuous distribution model.
sample:
SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT(0.75) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SALARY) 
   INTO :PC FROM EMPLOYEE 
   WHERE WORKDEPT = 'E21'
